name: Roto-soko MATCH!
description:
Stack, slide and rotate animals in this Sokoban inspired match-3 puzzle game!

Stack the matching animals togther by rotating the board and see how many moves it takes you to match them all.

Featuring three levels with different block types and randomly generate layouts.

Try and match all animals using the fewest possible moves.

Developed as part of the Kenney Jam 2021 with the theme 'Rotation'.

How To Play

  • Use the buttons to rotate the board clockwise/anticlockwise and move the animals
  • Click on an animal to stop it from moving when rotating
  • Match animals by stacking them in a vertical or horizontal line
  • All animals must be stacked together to complete the level
  • Grey Brick blocks will not move
  • Red Brick blocks will only move in the direction of the arrow

Credits

  • Assets: Kenney Sokoban, Kenney Animals, Kenney Game Icons
  • Fonts: Kenney Font

https://kenney.nl/
